email_body: -----Original Appointment----- From: Etienne, Bernadette On Behalf Of Butler, Pam Sent: Tuesday, November 06, 2001 1:35 PM To: Butler, Pam; Ratcliff, Renee; Martin, Thomas A.; Allen, Phillip K.; Neal, Scott Subject: Phantom Stock Payouts When: Thursday, November 08, 2001 11:30 AM-12:30 PM (GMT-08:00) Pacific Time (US & Canada); Tijuana. Where: EB1672 Attendees: Pam Butler Renee Ratcliff Larry Lewis Tom Martin Scott Neal Phillip Allen
